name: HipHop Flying Monsters Vault Pro
description:
HipHop Flying Monsters Vault is easy to play, Just jump into the hoops and avoid the spikes. Collect strawberry to unlock all the funny characters!
How far can you go?

Game Play
Eat a acorns to get 1 point
Jump into the hoop from above to get 2 points
You have enough skills to do it from below? Get 3 points!
